original_text: He always used stories to teach the people. Then he explained everything to his own disciples when he was alone with them.
korean_text: 비유가 아니면 말씀하지 아니하시고 다만 혼자 계실 때에 그 제자들에게 모든 것을 해석하시더라

sentences.original_text: He always used stories to teach the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 언제나 이야기를 사용하여 사람들을 가르치셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he explained everything to his own disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자신의 제자들에게 모든 것을 설명했습니다

sentences.original_text: when he was alone with them.
